description:
Welcome to Helicopter Hill Rescue Ambulance 2016
With this modern helicopter rescue games you will enjoy some brand new and enhanced helicopter simulator controlling experience. Ready to fly? Start the helicopter flight and let’s finish helicopter snow rescue missions. Take seat in your helicopter and get ready for some exciting ambulance rescue missions. Rush towards the emergency and save the city people. Be the hero of the city and take flight in this flight simulator games.

Be the helicopter pilot to navigate rescue helicopter flight and landings to save civilians, police officials and news reporters in emergency rescue situations. Those who love playing rescue helicopter and air ambulance games will love this helicopter flight game. Act as the rescue pilot and save the people in emergency situations. Fly in the skies and look around for emergency rescue areas and rescue them all. Save lives of people in danger and fulfill the duty of an air ambulance pilot.


GAMEPLAY FEATURES:
• Play as Helicopter Pilot
• Real-time 911 emergency Rescue Simulator
• Fly Over the City and Reach Emergency Areas
• Manual Helicopter Handling and Flying
• Multiple Gameplay Tasks to Complete
